name: Self-Destruct Mechanism (V)
Lore: '''''Fraid there''s not much left...I didn''t hit it that hard. It musta had a self-destruct.''',
Text: 'If your droid was just hit by a character weapon, lose that droid to target the character that fired that weapon. Draw destiny. Target hit and forfeit -4 if destiny +3 > defense value.',
